scripts.node:16: nvm use 16 && echo '; node 16' && node dist/index.js >> results.csv
scripts.node:18: nvm use 18 && echo '; node 18' && node dist/index.js >> results.csv
scripts.node:20: nvm use 20 && echo '; node 20' && node dist/index.js >> results.csv
scripts.node: npm run node:16 && npm run node:18 && npm run node:20
scripts.deno: nvm use 16 && echo '; deno' && deno run dist/index.js >> results.csv
scripts.bun: nvm use 16 && echo '; bun' && bun dist/index.js >> results.csv
scripts.bench: npm run node && npm run deno && npm run bun
